text: Ba a'roʙi ʙodijanisin, ki az cang taxalluf namudaand, ʙigu: «Ba zudi ʙaroi cang ʙa mardume saxt nerumand da'vat karda mesaved, ki ʙo onho ʙicanged jo musalmon savand. Agar ito'at kuned, Xudojaton muzde neku xohad dod va agar, hamcunon ki pes az in sar ʙartoftaed, sar ʙartoʙed, sumoro ʙa azoʙe dardovar azoʙ mekunad»
